list_definition.definition: a sign (eg a movement of the hand, a light, a sound), especially one arranged beforehand, giving a command, warning or other message

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He gave the signal to advance.

list_definition.definition: a machine etc used for this purpose
the wave, sound received or sent out by a radio set etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The policeman signalled the driver to stop.

list_definition.definition: to send (a message etc) by means of signals.
